code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a 47 YO white F cook presents with 3 years history of moderate feelings of apprehension when taking tests and moderate sudden onset of extreme anxiety, tremulousness and sweating immediately before public appearances. Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 66 in, Weight 126 lbs, Temperature 97.8 F, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 15 a:Anxiety p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Buspirone - 15 mg /day, and ordered GAD - 7 Assessment Tool.

s:a white female aged 49 Ys presents with moderate feelings of apprehension when taking tests x 12 days. patient also reports chronic moderate sudden onset of extreme anxiety, tremulousness and sweating immediately before public appearances. o:Height 67 in, Weight 127 lbs, Temperature 97.8 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 14 a:Anxiety p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Buspirone - 15 mg /day, and ordered GAD - 7 Assessment Tool.

content2.Unmatched: patient also reports chronic moderate sudden onset
